## VM.sendMouseMoveEvent() method

Sends an absolute mousemove event to the virtual machine.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
sendMouseMoveEvent(position: ScreenPosition): Promise<void>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  position | [ScreenPosition](./vm-providers.screenposition.md) | specifies the new coordinates of the mouse in the screen |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;void&gt;
